column2: The republican in fighting is now really interesting.
column5: Tonight in the republican friendly ultra rich Sea Island Georgia Liz Cheney went after the former guy with the most direct blast to date. This in event featuring Paul Ryan. #43 G W also weighed in today. Kerry Eleveld speculated this was going to be interesting.  Indeed! The lines are seemingly being drawn let's try watch and learn cuz this is an opportunity.
